Title: Relates to term limits for legislators, legislative staff, statewide elected officials and the staff of such officials
Summary: Establishes term limits for legislators and statewide elected officials of 8 years and legislative staff, executive staff, and employees of statewide elected officials for 12 years.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the legislative law, in relation to term limits for legislators, legislative staff, statewide elected officials and the staff of such officials
